objects.specification: The floor is a smooth, durable surface featuring a light neutral finish that enhances brightness throughout the space. It resembles polished hardwood or uniform tiles with a subtle reflective quality and minimal texture, creating a clean and spacious feel suitable for high-traffic classroom use.

The front wall is a flat vertical surface with a smooth plaster finish and a light neutral paint. It has crisp, sharp edges and a minimalistic aesthetic, providing a clean backdrop for educational equipment and displays.

The back wall presents a smooth plaster finish in a light neutral tone, creating a bright and open atmosphere. Its minimalistic style ensures that educational elements and decor stand out clearly against the surface.

The left side wall features a smooth plaster surface painted in a light neutral hue. Its clean lines and minimal texture serve as a versatile canvas for educational posters and shelving installations.

The right side wall is finished with smooth plaster and painted in a bright, light neutral shade. This minimalistic design enhances natural and artificial lighting, keeping the room feeling open and airy.

The teacher's desk is a spacious rectangular surface crafted from a darker rich wood tone with a smooth polished finish. It features integrated modest drawers beneath the tabletop and sturdy square legs, combining functionality and a professional yet welcoming aesthetic.

The teacher's chair is an ergonomic swivel design featuring a padded seat and backrest upholstered in a soft accent fabric. It sits on a sturdy base with smooth contours, providing adjustable posture support and a refined professional appearance.

A large rectangular whiteboard with a smooth, glossy surface and a slim, minimalistic frame. Designed for clear writing visibility and easy erasing, it features clean edges and a subtle mounting bracket for secure wall attachment.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a sleek, modern housing in neutral tones. It features a forward-facing lens and discreet ventilation slots, blending seamlessly with the ceiling while delivering crisp projected imagery.

A standard student desk featuring a light wood rectangular tabletop with gently rounded edges. It is supported by slender metal legs with a matching wood finish, offering a smooth matte surface for individual work.

A simple student chair with a molded wooden seat and backrest in a light wood tone, complemented by a soft accent-colored cushion. It rests on slender metal legs, providing ergonomic support in a uniform, welcoming design.

A flush-mounted LED ceiling light panel with a thin rectangular enclosure. It provides even, diffused cool-white illumination with a minimal frame, seamlessly integrated into the ceiling for unobtrusive brightness.

A tall wooden bookshelf finished in a warm wood tone matching the furniture group. It features multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with books of varying sizes and colors, supported by a sturdy back panel and simple vertical side panels.
A large rectangular window with a sleek neutral-colored frame and clear glass panes. It allows abundant natural light to flood the interior and offers unobstructed exterior views.
Soft fabric curtains in a muted tone with gentle vertical folds. They hang from a discreet curtain rod, adding subtle texture and warmth to the window opening while allowing adjustable light control.
A rectangular educational poster printed on matte paper with vibrant charts and diagrams. It has a thin border and is designed to be mounted flush against the wall for visual engagement.

A circular wall clock with a slim frame and a clear numeric face featuring bold hour markers and slender hands. The subtle metallic finish ensures visibility and timeless simplicity.
A simple cylindrical waste bin in a dark neutral color, constructed from durable plastic with a slightly tapered profile. It is open at the top for easy disposal and easy to maintain.

A medium-sized potted plant with lush green foliage, featuring multiple slender stems and leaves arranged in a natural pattern. It is planted in a simple ceramic pot with a matte finish that adds a touch of greenery and warmth to the corner.
